# qiime_parameters.txt
# WARNING: DO NOT EDIT OR DELETE Qiime/qiime_parameters.txt

pick_otus:input_seqs_filepath
pick_otus:otu_picking_method	cdhit
pick_otus:clustering_algorithm	furthest
pick_otus:max_cdhit_memory	400
pick_otus:output_dir	cdhit_picked_otus
pick_otus:refseqs_fp
pick_otus:blast_db
pick_otus:similarity	0.97
pick_otus:max_e_value	1e-10
pick_otus:prefix_prefilter_length
pick_otus:trie_prefilter	False
pick_otus:prefix_length	50
pick_otus:suffix_length	50

pick_rep_set:input_file
pick_rep_set:fasta_file
pick_rep_set:rep_set_picking_method	most_abundant
pick_rep_set:result_fp	<input_sequences_filepath>_rep_set.fasta
pick_rep_set:log_fp
pick_rep_set:sort_by	otu
align_seqs:input_fasta_fp
align_seqs:template_fp	none
align_seqs:alignment_method	pynast
align_seqs:pairwise_alignment_method	blast
align_seqs:blast_db
align_seqs:blast_executable
align_seqs:output_dir	pynast_aligned
align_seqs:min_length	1000
align_seqs:min_percent_id	75.0
filter_alignment:input_fasta_file
filter_alignment:output_dir
filter_alignment:lane_mask_fp
filter_alignment:allowed_gap_frac	 0.999999
assign_taxonomy:input_seqs_fp
assign_taxonomy:id_to_taxonomy_fp	none
assign_taxonomy:reference_seqs_fp	none
assign_taxonomy:assignment_method	blast
assign_taxonomy:blast_db	none
assign_taxonomy:confidence	0.8
assign_taxonomy:e_value	0.001
assign_taxonomy:output_dir	blast_assigned_taxonomy
make_phylogeny:input_fp
make_phylogeny:tree_method	fasttree
make_phylogeny:result_fp	<input_sequences_filename>.tre
make_phylogeny:log_fp
make_otu_table:input_otu_fname
make_otu_table:taxonomy
make_otu_table:output_fname	stdout
